name: VEWIOR 900W Blender for Shakes and Smoothies, Smoothie Blender with 6 Fins Blender Blade, Personal Blender for Kitchen, Smoothie Juice Mixer Include 2 * 22 oz To-Go Portable Cups
about_this_item: Upgraded 304 Stainless Smoothie Blender: Most blender for smoothies on the market only have a 4-leaf gearless blade, but Vewior smoothie blender has been comprehensively upgraded to 304 stainless steel 6-leaf gear blades. This design allows you to blend and extract nutrients easily. Turn the toughest whole foods into nutritious shakes, smoothies, and nut butter in 10 seconds.

Capacity Upgrade & Non BPA: This blender for shakes and smoothies comes with 2*22 oz/650ml portable cups. Besides, includes 2 travel lids, which add portability for carrying. All parts are BPA-free to ensure healthy drinking. Enjoy tasty & healthy homemade beverages everywhere.

Intermittent Press Operation: The blenders for kitchen adopts powerful pulse technology, which triggers the motor to rotate at high speed when pressed, with a max rotating speed of 25000 rpm, making the perfect drink within 10-20 seconds. Simply press and hold the smoothie blender's cup and immerse in the stirring process.

Easy to Clean Smoothie Blender: Fill with 3/4 clear water, and a few liquid dish soaps, shake the personal blender cup, and press down for cleaning. The blade is partially removable and can be cleaned by just rinsing with tap water. The blender for shakes and smoothies cups and to-go lids is dishwasher safe (below 158℉).

Multifunctional Blenders for Kitchen: With a 900W powerful motor, VEWIOR small blender for shakes and smoothies for fast mixing. The 6-leaf blade can be used for smoothies, juices, shakes, baby food, ice cream, and protein drinks.

title: Great customer service
content: I have really enjoyed this blender, but this morning a piece cracked, which made it not work at all anymore. I reached out to customer service and within a few hours back-and-forth they have agreed to replace it. They have been extremely easy to deal with and accommodating to my needs! Now, I will just await my replacement!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I got this product a year back and had issues with the blender. when I called customer support team, they were so prompt in responding back with necessary details. They asked me to send photos of the product with issues to review and help me with replacement. Very supportive and clear in understanding customer needs. Highly recommended product.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2024

title: Customer Support and assistance
content: Great blender for it's size and price. After 10months of using it, the rotating piece in the base of the blender broke off unfortunately. But it was very easy to get in touch with the Vewior team on chat. Because I'm still covered under warranty they will be sending a replacement. I'm impressed with how easy and quick the process has been!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2024

title: Wonderful product and great customer service
content: I ordered this to make some protein smoothies for myself and family. It's a great blender for the price. I didn't want to spend a fortune on a Vitamix so this is a decent alternative since we only intended to use it so smoothies. It has to work hard when you add ice and one of the plastic tabs that presses down to make the blender, blend, broke off shortly after we got it. We're still able to make it work but with it was a tad studier. But for the price? It's still good.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024

title: Easy to use – Exactly what I was looking for!
content: This smoothie blender works great.  We make smoothies multiple times a week with frozen fruit, ice, liquid, and the blender handles it all flawlessly.  You screw it on and then push down to activate the blade.  There's suction cups on the bottom to hold it in place, which I appreciate.  It comes with 2 cups & lids, and the blender itself is small enough to store easily and not be an eyesore on the counter.  The cups/lids/blades have held up well in the dishwasher.  So far, this has been a great blender and would definitely recommend it.

title: Great Blender.
content: I love my new Vewior blender! I grind seeds, nuts and dried berries almost every day and this blender does this beautifully. I make smoothies daily and this blender makes it super easy, fast and convenient. It comes with 3 cups in 2 sizes with lids! I can blend my nuts, seeds and berries in the smaller cup and then make my smoothie in one of the larger cups rather than getting out my grinder too. Counter space is extremely limited in my kitchen and now I don’t need the grinder! Woohoo! Summer smoothie making is going to be so easy now. 🥰 I highly recommend this blender, you’ll love it!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I've recently started making protein shakes and smoothies before work to take on my commute and this has made my life 1000 times easier. It's the perfect one serving size, it's so easy to use - just fill, flip, blend and exchange the lid to go. No extra dishes, no re-pouring, no wrong measurements and leftovers. The blade is super sharp and the power very strong, I've had no issues blending even ice cubes. 100% would recommend, great product.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2024

title: Amazing blender
content: I have owned this now for roughly 7 maybe 8 months now and wanted to give it a really good go before leaving a review. Overall I would say it has held up really well, I don’t use this every day but do use it frequently, it washes in the dishwasher just fine I have not found any rust spots on the blades and they haven’t become tighter from being washed in the dishwasher nor soaking in water over night. The plastic cups wash and rinse easy and leave no residue left behind, the 6 blade blender is perfect for bananas and seems to hold up well with flax seeds, if you don’t let the shakes settle between pulses though I have found that it misses chunks of bananas.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
